name: Derivation.commutator_coe_linear_map
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝² : CommRing R
A : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
D1 D2 : Derivation R A A
⊢ Eq (↑(Bracket.bracket D1 D2)) (Bracket.bracket ↑D1 ↑D2)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem commutator_coe_linear_map : ↑⁅D1, D2⁆ = ⁅(D1 : Module.End R A), (D2 : Module.End R A)⁆ :=
  rfl

name: Derivation.commutator_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝² : CommRing R
A : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
D1 D2 : Derivation R A A
a : A
⊢ Eq ((Bracket.bracket D1 D2) a) (HSub.hSub (D1 (D2 a)) (D2 (D1 a)))
decl:
theorem commutator_apply : ⁅D1, D2⁆ a = D1 (D2 a) - D2 (D1 a) :=
  rfl
